attributes.additional_details:
This website has quickly become a way for idiots to claim that their views are the best way forward for the country. From one petition complaining that Sharia law was coming to get us all (Written unbiasedly by a member of the EDL) to complaints that India have a space program and we dont. Really?

No one wants a government that pretends to listen, we just want a government that looks like its doing something. As long as the goverment is seen to be doing something "wrong" by someone it will all be okay.
